questions.question:
The Awakening
You awaken in your cozy compartment, surrounded by the scent of fresh flowers and adventure. Do you:

options.text: Gaze out the window, not questioning why you are here.
Excitedly call out to your fellow passengers, eager to share your dreams.

questions.question:
The Uncharted Map
You peek outside your compartment and see the only other fellow traveler in the train walking past your compartment. Do you:

options.text: Try to stop them and ask where the train is going.
Oh, they look busy, I won't bother them.

questions.question:
The Enchanted Locket
You walk to a different cart and a mysterious traveler tries to sell you a locket that supposedly holds magical properties that he spent years crafting. Do you:

options.text: Try to refuse it and end up giving him money.
Examine it critically, questioning both the locket and his authenticity.

questions.question:
The Dining Car Decision
In the dining car, two meals are offered. Do you:

options.text: Choose the dish that looks like you have never seen before but smells delicious.
Select the dish that looks like something familiar but looks cold.

questions.question:
The Garden of Whispers
The train makes a sudden stop at a garden filled with exotic flowers, and everyone on the train is suddenly gone. Do you:

options.text: Listen to the whispers, intrigued by their hidden meanings.
Look for the passengers you just saw and where they went.

questions.question:
The Fork in the Tracks
You walk for what feels like hours and suddenly there is a fork in the pathway made of two different things. Do you choose:

options.text: The stone pathway.
Decide on the clearly marked path, valuing the safest option.

questions.question:
The Heartfelt Encounter
A stranger shares a heartbreaking story about losing their village to the dragonâ€™s fury. Do you:

options.text: Feel a strong urge to comfort them and offer assistance.
Ask practical questions to understand the situation better.

questions.question:
The Mysterious Villager
You notice an enigmatic villager who seems to hold secrets of the realm in the corner of the bar. Do you:

options.text: Approach them, asking questions on how to defeat the dragon.
Observe quietly from your seat, take in everything they are saying.

questions.question:
The Confrontation
As you approach the Dragon's Den, the dragon appears, fiery and fierce, challenging you to a confrontation. Do you:

options.text: Feel a sense of compassion for the dragon and consider finding a way to help it.
Decide to confront the dragon and fight to prove your strength.

questions.question:
The Dragon's Choice
The dragon looks weary, and you have the chance to offer a truce. Do you:

options.text: Use your charm to persuade the dragon to join you as an ally.
Outline a formal agreement to ensure peace between you and the dragon.

questions.question:
The Weapon Choice
As you prepare for battle, you can choose your weapon. Do you:

options.text: Grab a glowing stick that radiates magic, believing it will give you an edge.
Use the rusty sword you've carried with you, trusting its familiarity.

questions.question:
The Celebration
After your encounter with the dragon, whether in battle or alliance, you are exhausted but decide to celebrate your victory. Do you:

options.text: Announce the news to the village and celebrate.
Walk into the nearest restaurant for a celebratory meal.

questions.question:
The Alarm of Reality
As your adventure nears its conclusion, you hear an alarm echoing in the distance, pulling you back to reality. Do you:

options.text: Turn it off, choosing to stay in this magical world just a little longer.
Wake up from the dream, ready to embrace the lessons learned.
